p: This paper reports on how ten European global health research institutions in the ‘TropEd’ network for education in international health are transitioning to environmentally sustainable operations and reducing their carbon footprint [10]. The TropEd institutions conduct research, education and field work in global health. We spoke to 11 key informants from nine of the 10 member institutions in the network to ascertain the common success factors in implementing environmentally sustainable operations and how to tackle the challenges.
